```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| message: false
source(here::here("scripts", "00_libraries.R"))
```

```{r}
#| label: print-list
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| results: 'asis'
dir_ls(path = here("models")) |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(value = str_remove(value, here("models/"))) |>
  separate(value, into = c("pre", "value"), sep = 3) |> 
  mutate(
    order = 1:n(), 
    lab = str_replace(value, "_", " "), 
    out = glue("1. [{lab}](https://www.jvcasillas.com/stan_101/models/{pre}{value}/index.html)")
  ) |> 
  arrange(order) |> 
  pull(out)
```
